officialTitle: A Phase 3, Open-Label, Safety Study of Lofexidine
summary: The purpose of this Phase 3 open-label treatment study is to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of lofexidine at a clinically relevant dose to alleviate symptoms of acute withdrawal from any opioid, including methadone and buprenorphine. This study will take place in a variety of clinical scenarios, both in-clinic and outpatient settings.

primaryOutcome.measure: Overall Occurrence of Treatment Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs)
